      List<GoalDTO> AppController.getAllGoals()
      This method calls the goalService to get all the goals available in the database
      Methods in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.controllers with parameters of type GoalDTO 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AppController.createGoal(GoalDTO goalDTO)
      This method calls the goalService to create a goal after receiving the information from the goalDTO from the Request Body of the HTTP Request
      void AppController.updateGoal(GoalDTO goalDTO)
      This method calls the goalService to update a goal after receiving the information from the goalDTO from the Request Body of the HTTP Request

    • Uses of GoalDTO in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services

      Methods in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services that return types with arguments of type GoalDTO 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<GoalDTO> GoalService.getAllGoals()
      This method calls the goalRepository to retrieve all the records in the goal table in the database and putting the information of the entity object into a goalDTO object.
      Methods in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services with parameters of type GoalDTO 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GoalService.createGoal(GoalDTO goalDTO)
      This method creates a Goal based on the information provided by the GoalDTO received from the REST Controller.
      void GoalService.updateGoal(GoalDTO goalDTO)
      This method updates the Goal based on the information received int the goalDTO.
